isdparser
=========

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE
)
```

`isdparser` is an parser for ISD/ISD NOAA files

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropenscilabs/isdparser")
```

```{r}
library('isdparser')
```

### Parse an ISD file

```{r}
path <- system.file('extdata/725300-94846-2014.gz', package = "isdparser")
isd_parser(path)
```
